Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Asked in advance months in advance for a room with a view arrived and staff promised that this room was being sorted out for myself Waited over several hours only to be placed in a room 4th floor that did not have the view that I was promised by staff I was disappointed by the day time staff and felt they were slightly disorganised but overall I enjoyed my stay
Positive_Review: I liked the location The concierge didn t get his name who works nights at the weekends I found extremely helpful efficient shame he wasn t working in the days

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: WiFi was poor but that was not vital as a leisure trip If on business it would not be acceptable
Positive_Review: Room great especially view of Eiffel Tower Didn t eat in the hotel but found several very pleasant eating places just off the tourist areas

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: All staff from reception to restaurant were very friendly and accommodating I had a late evening long haul flight to catch and wanted to take a shower before my flight after a day of walking around in the hot weather The staff were very accommodating and offered me a room to use late afternoon for 45 mins to freshen up which was appreciated

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: N A
Positive_Review: Staff were so friendly and helpful all the extra details in the room were much appreciated including English plug sockets and USB points nice kettle rocking chair and view were fab

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The decor and the location in particular were excellent Perfect if you don t want to leave Montmartre explore the area around the hotel it s more beautiful than central Paris

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: This was my 3rd time there I love the way they ve combined design with some classical touch each room is a bit different you feel like home not a standard hotel room

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Spent in this hotel one night and immediately fell in love with it To me all other hotels of Paris do not exist eny longer Terrass is my new townhouse in Paris

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: No coffee in room just tea Couldnt figure out room service times very confusing
Positive_Review: Really comfy bed Gorgeous room Excellent helpful staff Great location close to Sacre Couer and all attractions and easy metro ride away 5 min walk to closest metro Would stay again

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Nothing I will recommend this hotel over and over as it is really good value for money on top of it all
Positive_Review: Super friendly and professional staff taking care of us from the moment we set foot inside Rooms were spacious clean and well fitted I had a beautiful view over Paris The Terrace is to die for and you get to eat your breakfast with this view Also open until 1am for drinks

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The breakfast was delicious with fresh orange juice croissants and pastry and products of local farms ham yoghurt Views from some rooms and hotel restaurant are magnificent Eiffel tower visible in distance The staff was friendly but the lady in chief of the reception was just awesome and helpful We also loved the maid everything was kept totally clean and we got bar of chocolate from her everyday Thank you Terrass

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Noise from rooftop bar continues to 1 00 am Sounds of furniture being moved
Positive_Review: Location to so many bars restaurants Wonnderful view from rooftop and restaurant

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: The 95 bus across the street is no longer That was my way to go down to the Opera and to the museums Sure I can use the Metro but the views from the bus are fun
Positive_Review: I ve been staying at this hotel since 1986 After the renovation it has been a pleasurable stay every time The staff is bi lingual and very helpful The restaurant and terrace is great with a beautiful of the Eiffel Tower It s in Montmartre which for me is the best part of Paris A little more funky with a great vibe

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Absolutely loved our stay fantastic location hotel is very clean and all the staff are extremely friendly The roof top bar restaurant was a real bonus with amazing views over Paris

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Bathroom was slightly small but very clean
Positive_Review: Really helpful and friendly staff they were all excellent They couldn t do enough for you and made some excellent restaurant recommendations they even phoned and made the bookings too Hotel is close to the Metro and not too far from Gare du Nord for those travellers coming to Paris on Eurostar Highly recommended

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The staff were really friendly and helped with recommendations It s worthwhile downloading the app the hotel recommends as it gives you so many suggestions on where to go what to do The roof top bar is a must especially for the view The bottle of wine and handwritten note left was such a nice surprise as I had booked for my husbands 30th The hotel was close to so many cafes and restaurants Would definitely go back

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: I hadn t read any reviews stating some of the rooms face a cemetery Our room s view was the cemetery and i wasn t comfortable with it at first but it ended up being nice
Positive_Review: The staff was very accommodating and the room was a nice size The hotel was in a great location with amazing views from the restaurant and rooftop bar

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Hotel is on a busy junction but was well soundproofed so traffic noise was not a major issue
Positive_Review: Comfy room very clean Conveniently located to explore Montmartre and within easy reach of the Metro system Breakfast was good and Staff were very helpful

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: I would love to have had a drink at the bar but it was very crowded The safe in the room didn t work and I would have liked a robe in the bathroom Also the shower was tricky at first the overhead flooded the bathroom
Positive_Review: The view was spectacular The staff was very helpful in making recommendations of places to eat in the area The location can t be beat

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: there is a very bad smell on my room at morning t was so disturbing I had to open all windows to take this smell out on second morning same bad smell was still there my room was on last floor maybe this is the reason but the hotel needs to solve this problem
Positive_Review: reception staff is perfect location is perfect decoration is perfect restaurant is very good specially the terrass is very good with a stunning panoramic Paris view

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Nothing always wanted to stay in this hotel and it met my expectations
Positive_Review: Lovely suite with view of Eiffel Tower Loved the spa treatments Fantastic roof top bar

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Although rooms were very clean we spotted a mouse in the restaurant kitchen during the brunch Management took care of it immediately The rest of the hotel was very clean
Positive_Review: Very great location with marvelous view on Paris and Eiffel tower Very good food in restaurant and very pleasant terrasse on the top floor to take a drink

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: More English tv channels e g sky news
Positive_Review: Excellent location Excellent lighting in room good reading light Good facilities tea coffee bathrobes Lovely roof terrace

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: The terrace bar could should have been more elegant luxurious It was a bit hohum The decor in the rooms is modern edgy may not be to everyone s taste
Positive_Review: Very comfortable and a decent size room a view of the Eiffel Tower is definitely worthwhile as said by everyone else on this site it was a misty week with a sometimes brutal wind but when those glittery lights lit up the sky at 6pm and the 360degree searchlight soared over the whole of Paris ahh Bathroom excellent and very clean This is a very well renovated boutique hotel with graceful public areas in the lobby coffee and newspapers available Easy access to great local shops Abbesses and metros Place de Clichy and Blanche Top of our list to stay in Paris We didn t eat in the hotel

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Breakfast couldn t find the butter and eggs cold
Positive_Review: Bar staff on rooftop terrace bar are excellent special mention to Versay a hard working Gentleman who made our stay very welcoming

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Very quirky room Bathroom fabulous bed extremely comfortable Rooftop terrace fantastic one of the best views in paris Staff excellent extremely helpful Location great we loved monmartre We travel alot and stay in high class hotels and were extremely impressed with le terrass Will recommend to our friends

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: The bed was two single beds joined together which was not the best
Positive_Review: Location location location VIEW from eighth floor room 802 was very impressive staff very helpful Roof terrace with cocktails makes for a great pre evening entertainment or end of evening drinks

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: No complaints
Positive_Review: The staff was excellent Very friendly and helpful Rooftop restaurant and bar a highlight The room was clean and very quiet Location was the best for exploring Montmartre on foot and so many options for public transportation to all major sites in Paris Many restaurants and entertainment close by Moulin Rouge show outstanding Loved the whole experience

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great location montmarte is a great place the staff is extra polite and does lots of favors the design is really nice the view is amazing perfect breakfeast the bathroom

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH

Positive_Review: Kind and helpful staff Cool area big room and nice sauna place The hotel is very clean and nicely designed

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: the view from our room overlooked a cemetery this would be the only thing I would change on my next visit is a different room with a different view
Positive_Review: The staff were excellent helpful polite professional there is no room for improvement perfect service We had complementary wine waiting in the room the restaurant and bar were our favourite from the whole Paris trip

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: The decor it wasn t that we found it distasteful it s just that the design of the tables and cupboards which were fairly useless took up so much space The room felt cluttered and overdone

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: The maid come in one morning when the do not disturb sign was on the door

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Shower and toilet are separate from each other Toilet is in a small cramped space Shower door is not properly sealed It s impossible to take a shower without making a mess
Positive_Review: Great location if you are staying in Montmartre close to nice caf s and restaurants as well as 2 subway stations Efficient and accommodating staff Their rooftop bar is amazing and so is their Sunday brunch best scrambled eggs I ve ever had

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: I wish our room had a bath tub
Positive_Review: This location is perfect for anyone looking to experience the neighborhood of Montmartre in Paris I booked this hotel when my father came to visit me in Paris and he loved it The hotel has a unique view of the entire city and the Eiffel tour and the rooftop bar is fantastic The breakfast that was included was also delicious with a lot of different meat cheese and other yummy food I 100 percent recommend this hotel for anyone looking to stay in this area of Paris during your stay Rooms appear as advertised

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Could hear the people in the room upstairs walking around quite loudly at night
Positive_Review: Loved everything From the big deep bath to the coffee machine in the room Super comfy bed and excellent restaurant The view of the Eiffel Tower from our room was exceptional

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Lovely view over the city as per the Booking com website photos however the Eiffel Tower was further away than in the photos and there was an ugly office block and cemetery opposite us Otherwise perfect
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: I honestly cannot think of a single thing we didn t like
Positive_Review: The beds were incredibly comfortable The staff were lovely and the hotel was central for amazing bars and restaurants Loved the roof top terrace bar

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The front desk staff were terrific They arranged transportation for us to the airport the next morning since we arrived late and had to leave early Next time we hope to make it to the roof terrace to telax

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Unfortunately smoking in the outdoor rooftop bar area is still allowed by law in France and if you are a non smoker that is not pleasant and there are a lot of smokers still in Europe The Terrass Hotel is not to blame for that
Positive_Review: The reception staff in particular could not do enough for you It was a pleasure to have met reception concierge staff so knowledgable friendly and courteous These people made our 7 day stay fantastic A special thanks to Sophie We have stayed in many 4 5 star hotels throughout the world but the Terrass Hotel staff topped the lot The large chain hotels especially can take a lesson from the Terrass Hotel I have been GM in 5 star hotels and now feel that I could have done much more to have made guests happy Restaurant staff also were very good professional and friendly

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The view from our room was wonderful room service meal was excellent The hotel location is very convenient for the sites we wanted to visit

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Best part of Paris to stay in and an incredible view from the upper rooms Breakfast was great as was the roof terrace for a drink in the afternoon

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Complicated lighting system complicated safe locking procedure unjustifyably high room service and breakfast costs
Positive_Review: Very comfortable and modern rooms great location high quality service overall and wonderful views from room and a bonus rooftop terrass bar

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: spa is very poor view from the studio dartist is horrible practicly into wall room service menu could be better
Positive_Review: Location was great view on eiffel tower from the bar too studio dartis is big and well equiped too

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: The room wasn t worth our money paid Lovely stay but had to complain about a few features that wernt working The staff did over compensate for these though and rectified our complaint

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Room was lovely and fantastic location We didn t manage to eat at the restaurant in the evening but the breakfast was great The staff were very helpful booking various trips restaurants and taxis wherever required

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff went out of their way to ensure our comfort and anticipated our every need The rooms were well appointed and the beds were particularly comfy I would stay at Terrass again if I were in Montmartre

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: The drinks at the bar are on the steep side 16 euros for a cocktail but the view is amazing and the environment and service were great so it was fine really
Positive_Review: We loved this hotel It s so nice to arrive somewhere and have it completely meet your expectations The room was big the decor and facilities were fantastic and the bed was sooooo comfortable The bar on the roof was amazing also

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: staff at breakfast very grumpy and not very helpful no tea coffee in room and no place to put clothes in drawers
Positive_Review: the view from the room was wonderful the staff at reception were excellant breakfast was adequate good location

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: We had specifically booked a suite with Eiffel Tower views for our last few days in Paris only to find ourselves in a room with views of a brick wall Upon pointing out the error to the gentleman at front desk he managed it very ungraciously and somewhat arrogantly We eventually ended up in a suite with just partial views and yet rather than acknowledging this was still a lesser category than what we had booked and apologising or making amends we were made to feel like we were being done a great favour by the hotel in moving us We did not need to hear the blame against booking com for the problem at hand or about any issues they were having with them we just needed it resolved in pleasant manner and perhaps a nice touch would have been to offer us something complimentary to make up for the inconvenience and disappointment This poor customer service tainted our overall experience and opinion of the hotel
Positive_Review: The room was very comfortable and spacious Location was very good

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: The maitre d was a little frosty on the busy night we ate in the restaurant
Positive_Review: Amazing view across Paris to the Eiffel Tower from the roof terrace bar especially good at night with the tower lit up Friendly helpful reception staff who were happy to advise on local attractions and restaurants Such a comfortable bed The cocktails were outstanding Good bus routes from right outside the hotel to the centre of Paris

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH

Positive_Review: Likes the design and interior of the room friendly staff

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel was charming and the staff so helpful The location was perfect and we loved the rooftop bar best hotel experience in a long time Loved it all

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH

Positive_Review: The view from the terrace is magnificent The staff are exceptionally polite and helpful The bedding is comfortable and the room quiet The wifi is consistent and the connection fast The breakfast is delicious

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Leaving
Positive_Review: Pierre the concierge was insanely helpful The rooms were magnificent the staff kind and accommodating Truly a wonderful end to a big journey away

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: One thing I missed was fresh vegetables during the breakfast
Positive_Review: Superb view during breakfast or dinner super friendly staff nicely decorated rooms tasty food great quality things everywhere Lovely place would recommend for romantic stay

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: We didn t stay long enough
Positive_Review: Everything the view was amazing This room was exactly what you want from a trip to Paris A view of the effiel tower great accommodations and the service was spot on

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: n a
Positive_Review: The location was great the room we stayed in 604 was spacious and best positioned in the hotel for a lovely view of the Eiffel Tower The staff at the hotel front desk were exceptional very friendly and helpful

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: No comment Everything was great An amazing hotel to spend our last night in Paris
Positive_Review: We paid a premium for the view of the Eiffel Tower and that s what we got The bathroom was huge I loved that we could move the tv and watch it from the bath tub The layout and space of the room was fantastic Breaky on the terrace overlooking Paris was a memory i ll cherish forever

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH

Positive_Review: Rooms are very nicely decorated generous bathrooms super comfortable beds Terrace view is amazing be it for breakfast or dinner The neighborhood has a lot to offer with only few mins walk till Sacre Coeur

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: There s no longer a shuttle bus that runs from the airport to the hotel and there s no tea making facilities in the rooms as advertised Tea and coffee available to order from Reception but it is the smallest cup of coffee in the world Not really made to feel very welcome in the rooftop bar felt as if we were in the way if you weren t eating
Positive_Review: Staff were brilliant views from rooftop bar fantastic rooms super clean and comfy The lobby smells really nice We would definitely return

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Having to leave
Positive_Review: This hotel is every bit as good as it looks and sounds from the website We stayed for two nights and it was beyond comfortable A short walk to a hub of great restaurant bars and amenities Slightly busy road out the front but double glazing keeps the noise out mostly and the air can works a treat I don t think I ve ever had a better view for breakfast and the food matched the views quality A really great hotel with friendly staff who speak good English Highly recommend

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Large bd was two beds pushed together created a little valley

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Perfect location in the heart of Montmartre with the best view of Paris simply magical Staff very helpful and friendly wonderful room with an extremely comfortable bed and everything else once needs for a great stay

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: We wanted tea coffee making facilities in our room Also housekeeping left their trolley with dirty laundry outside our room 401 all day and it did not get moved until 8 pm at night Not nice for us
Positive_Review: Reception ambassordors were very fruendly and helpful Tops Breakfast room and upstairs terrace very lovely Food lovely

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Book the restaurant early as you cannot just show up as it gets so busy We didn t get to eat there at all 24 hour room service not a big choice
Positive_Review: Complimentary wine Concierge amazing View incredible English speaking staff are so helpful Rooftop cocktails

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: There was no help with the bags or explanation of hotel breakfast times rooftop etc during check in just given the key and told where to go Some rooms facing the courtyard lack light but those on low floors facing the street can be a little loud
Positive_Review: The design and location are top notch It s very clean and chic The larger rooms are definitely well presented and arranged and the views from the rooftop are unbelievable

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: The hassle trying to book a table for dinner considering we were residents Found the bar terrace bar far too busy with non residents Bathroom size
Positive_Review: Nice modern hotel Lovely comfortable bed bedding Views Location

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff was phenomenal They were all incredibly helpful I didn t get the name of the man who helped me when I checked in but he was very kind and friendly I arrived on my own with my daughter due to join me later on Saturday evening Unfortunately her flight was delayed 7 hours which caused her to miss her connecting flight in Copenhagen so she didn t arrive in Paris until Sunday The staff took pity on us since she missed one of her two nights in Paris and upgraded us to a rooftop room with an amazing view of the Eiffel Tower So I enjoyed the wonderful view the first night and we both loved it for the second night There is also a rooftop bar and restaurant with a similar view The breakfast was very substantial It wasn t included in the room rate that we arranged but it can be part of a package It was worth the cost There was a fairly new staff member by the name of Pierre Antoine who was incredibly helpful with directions and I m directionally challenged with suggestions for dining etc The hotel was very modern sleek and clean We loved our stay at Terrass and would definitely recommend it

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: More channels on the TVs in English Tea and coffee in rooms
Positive_Review: The rooms were different in a good way Beds like fluffy clouds Food and view from restaurant fab Eiffel Tower in full view as were most attractions from top floor restaurant

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: The breakfast was a bit too pricey for us but there were plenty of other reasonable options near to the hotel
Positive_Review: Great hotel and friendly staff all in a lovely part of Paris The terrace has a fab view of the city

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: we didn t get to eat on the terrass apart from at breakfast as it was fully booked in the evenings so please book in advance to avoid disappointment
Positive_Review: amazing view from the Terass customer service is amazing

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: The room was very noisy as it was facing a busy intersection Also acess to the terrace was limited as guests of the hotel cannot reserve a table on the terrace and it is very busy
Positive_Review: The room was lovely and very clean

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Only a partial view of the Effiel Tower from room Thought that the Hotel might have left a little surprise in the room considering we were celebrating our wedding anniversary
Positive_Review: Location and walking guide to local area Room top terrace fantastic

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Everything was great but me and my friend went and ate out breakfast and dinner every day but the first day we decided to have breakfast n the hotel we only had tea and some cornflakes and got charged 25 each 50 in total I was fine paying as we did only book for a room but the price could be lowered 25 is a lot for some cereal and tea but otherwise I couldn t fault the place
Positive_Review: It s a great clean modern hotel the rooms are very well decorated and the whole hotel loved the roof top bar over looking Paris has a very good location staff were very helpful and polite doesn t take long to get to from the airport only 50 for a taxi I will be coming back again definitely 5 star

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH

Positive_Review: Bed was comfy View was great Staff were friendly all spoke English

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: We really had no complaints
Positive_Review: We loved the Juliette balcony with the view of the eiffel Tower Fantastic turn down service with little chocolates Super friendly helpful staff

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Not so easy to stop unload and then park the car Some might not like the cemetery views
Positive_Review: Very friendly staff Perfect but simple breakfast VERY dog friendly The relaxed terrace bar is a real find

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Room size adequate not large
Positive_Review: Very efficient check in process Location close enough to 3 Metro stations 500 M nut not so straightforward to find without detailed map Nice room view over Cimetiere Montmartre and Paris and splendid roof top terrace

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: Need more staff on the terrace bar service was quite slow
Positive_Review: Lovely bedrooms super comfy beds windows that opened and a great location Amazing views from the roof terrace

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: We had to go home
Positive_Review: We had a fantastic stay at the Terrass Hotel Montmartre Although we did not have a room with a view of the Eifel Tower we still enjoyed the view along the street and across to the Montmartre Cemetery The room was clean modern and spacious The breakfast was lovely and a good choice for all tastes and worth the price to enjoy the view of the Eifel Tower and Paris Make sure you at least have a drink in the Terrass Bar after dark to see the Eifel Tower lights on the hour The hotel is in an ideal area close to the restaurants shops and Abbesses Metro We hope to go back soon

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: The only point I would say is if you have allergies to perfume then the reception area is heavily perfumed so just be aware

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH

Positive_Review: Room v stylish Staff v accommodating Roof top bar gorgeous Bed v comfortable Couldn t ask for more

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH

Positive_Review: Staff is excellent The view of the Eiffel Tower is amazing Convenient location with a lot of shops around The metro station is down the street which is very easy to get to anywhere in Paris

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH

Hotel_Name: Terrass H tel Montmartre by MH
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel on the edge of Montmartre We were on the 6th floor with terrific views of the city and Effiel Tower Excellent facilities with room and staff friendly and helpful I asked for flowers in the room and a lovely bouquet was left in the room on arrival Nice touch with the wine for the anniversary too The Terrance restaurant gave great views too we only had breakfast and that was OK Would definitely stay here again
